content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog this textured doily has 23 rounds and measures about 10 1/2 in diameter rounds 1-4 measure 2 pattern is written using u s terminology **materials needed** * size 10 crochet thread in 2 colors color 1- 125-150 yards color 2- 5-10 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * beg 4-double_crochet cluster * 4-double_crochet cluster * 2-double_crochet decrease * 3-double_crochet decrease * 2-fpsc decrease * 3-double_crochet popcorn * 2-fpdc decrease * 2-fpdc cluster * beg 3-double_crochet cluster * 3-double_crochet cluster * 3-fpdc decrease * picot * large picot
